
h1. RTL Support of DMS Portlets

DMS offers Arabic language support. When users change the language into Arabic or set displaying language in Arabic, the displaying on DMS has been changed the direction from the Right to the Left (RTL), because when Arabic people read something, they usually read from the right to  the left. Use Portal version 2.5.1 or more to have the best view.

Some screen shots of DMS portlet with RLT
